errors.error_description: Logical order error - pip installation should come after system dependency installation in the same code block
correction_candidates:
First, make sure to install the required system dependencies:
```
sudo apt-get install adb python3-dev
```
Then install the Python package:
```
pip3 install androidviewclient --upgrade
```

Install system dependencies and then the Python package:
```
sudo apt-get install adb python3-dev
pip3 install androidviewclient --upgrade
```

Run the following commands in order:
```
sudo apt-get install adb python3-dev
```
```
pip3 install androidviewclient --upgrade
```

Installation steps:
1. Install system dependencies: `sudo apt-get install adb python3-dev`
2. Install Python package: `pip3 install androidviewclient --upgrade`
errors.golden_answer:
Install system dependencies and then the Python package:
```
sudo apt-get install adb python3-dev
pip3 install androidviewclient --upgrade
```
